amendment.description: To expand the authority of the Marshal of the Supreme Court and the Supreme Court Police to protect retired and former Chief Justices and Associate Justices of the Supreme Court of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3355 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
